mapper.select: select c.* from (select a.*, rownum rn from (SELECT FROM ORDER BY FIELD36 desc) a where #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER} >= rownum) c where c.rn >= #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c.* from (select a.*, rownum rn from (SELECT FROM where 1=1
and FIELD36 >= #{startDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and #{endDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= FIELD36
and field28 like '%' || #{field28,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and field42 like '%' || #{field42,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and field39 like '%' || #{field39,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and field40 like '%' || #{field40,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY FIELD36 desc) a where #{endP,jdbcType=INTEGER} >= rownum) c where c.rn >= #{startP,jdbcType=INTEGER}

and FIELD36 >= #{startDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and #{endDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} >= FIELD36
and field28 like '%' || #{field28,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
